attributes.action: Sir Alex Ferguson Should Apologise for his Behavior
attributes.additional_details:
Manchester United manager Sir Alex Ferguson should apologise for the disgraceful behavior targeted at the referee, assistant(s) and fourth official during the FA Premier League football match against Newcastle United on Boxing Day 2012.

His disrespectful behavior at Old Trafford Stadium Manchester - seen by children and screened live worldwide - went unpunished on the day and the Football Association (the incompetent governing body of English football) ran scared and swept it under the carpet - as usual.

Respect campaign? He should apologise immediately!
